posts.post_title: FS: Low Grade T206 Southern League Lot - ALL Cards $25-$30 Each **FINAL PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 Southern League cards available for sale or trade. Scans and grades should accurately reflect the condition. 

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards...3 or more ship for free. I accept payment via any method you prefer. Thanks for looking and please feel free to send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or to reserve cards.

CARDS PICTURED (removing **SOLD** cards for easier viewing):

King - $25
Lentz SGC A - $30
Miller (Piedmont) - $30
Smith (card on right, faded color) - $25
Bump for a price drop on all remaining cards.
Bump for a final price drop to clear out the rest of these.  Thanks for looking!
